snippet: In the face of concern over China’s economy, European markets slumped, while shares in the United States recovered to finish nearly flat.
abstract: Stock markets worldwide are turbulent amid concerns about second drop in Chinese renminbi; United States stocks are flat.
lead_paragraph: In the face of concern over China’s economy, European markets slumped, while shares in the United States recovered to finish nearly flat.

headline.main: Stocks Wobble, Then Recover on Wall Street
headline.print_headline: Uncertainty About China Rattles Global Markets
